participant_1.background:
My longest relationship was two years long, but I ended it because I felt like we were going in different directions.
i take pride in getting straight a s.
I went hiking and swimming last time I was on vacation.
I haven't seen my family in years, but I'd love to buy a mobile for their nursery.
I went on a quilting retreat in the mountains with my friends.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores.
I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son.
i enjoy reading history books.
i wear a lot of purple.
My worst nightmare is drugs and alcohol harming my family and I am a peaceful person who would never hurt anyone.

content.text: Hey! How are you?
Good, I just got back from the library. What about you?
I'm good, just finished quilting a baby blanket.
That's awesome! What are you going to do with it?
I'm giving it to my sister's new baby.
That's so sweet! I'm sure she'll love it.
I hope so. I love quilting, it's so relaxing.
I can imagine. I love reading, it's also very relaxing.
What do you like to read?
I love history books, they're so interesting.
Me too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose, but I think I'd have to say "The Diary of Anne Frank".
That's a great book! I read it in high school and it really stuck with me.
Me too. It's such a powerful story.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love taking my friends to local coffee shops and bookstores.
That sounds fun! I love going to bookstores too.
Me too! I love the smell of books.
Me too! And I love the feeling of finding a good book.
Me too! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I have a huge stack of books to read right now.
I'm jealous! I wish I had more time to read.
Me too! But I make time for the things I love.
That's good! I try to do the same.
I'm glad! I think it's important to have hobbies and interests
